# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Stone furnace at position (41.0, -80.0)
- Burner inserter at position (39.5, -79.5)
- Burner inserter at position (41.5, -78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position (60.0, -60.0)

- Stone furnace at position (60.0, -60.0)

### Electricity generator at position (106.5, -32.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump at position (106.5, -32.5)
- Boiler at position (111.5, -32.0)
- Steam engine at position (117.5, -30.5)
- Pipe group at position (107.5, -34.5)
- Pipe group at position (105.5, -32.5)
- Electricity group at position (114.5, -28.666666666666668)

### Transport belt system at position (40.5, -83.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Belt group at position (40.5, -83.5)
- Transport belt at position (63.5, -53.5)
- Transport belt at position (64.5, -53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors due to lack of fuel
- Ensure that burner mining drills and boilers have a sufficient fuel supply to operate.
- Check the status of entities to identify those that are out of fuel.

### Errors due to missing ingredients
- Ensure that stone furnaces have the necessary ingredients to operate.
- Check the status of entities to identify those that are missing ingredients.

### Errors due to disconnection from the electric network
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the electric network to operate.
- Check the status of entities to identify those that are not connected to the electric network.

### Errors due to empty or full output pipe groups
- Ensure that pipe groups are properly connected and have a balanced input and output.
- Check the status of entities to identify those that have empty or full output pipe groups.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
